extendedInfo.description: Messages from Senior Pastor Sai Song and other guest speakers. Daily devotions, including the latest [Bread on-line], [the Truth], and live iM Friday Night service broadcasting.The multimedia is mainly in Chinese Mandarin.Come to iM: inspiring MomentEnjoy this moment with your heartEnjoy this moment of inspirationEnjoy this moment of joy and peace from the Holy SpiritExperience the presence of God and His splendorGod said to Moses, "I AM WHO I AM. This is what you are to say to the Israelites: 'I AM has sent me to you.Exodus Exodus 3:14I AM, which is the name of the Lord,He is exalted in the name of self-existent One True God.iM Church - inspiring Moment - share a moment with God, any time, anywherei'M, iM, Inspiring Moment, Mobile Church, Jesus Christ, Bible, truth, holy spirit, peace and joy, Sai Song, the Bible, Jesus Christ
